successes.title: De La Soul's NEW ALBUM
successes.description: Welcome 2 making magic. The time has finally come: De La Soul is ready to record a new studio LP.

Pledges.description:
LOVE BUCKS:
You’ll receive an email extending our eternal appreciation for supporting this project and being part of our continued legacy! Thank you!

THE DIGITAL ALBUM + BONUS: 
Are you ready for new music? For your pledge you’ll receive the advanced digital download of our new album + an additional bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).

CD IN HAND: 
How about two scoops? We'll send you a CD of our new album + bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).
And the advanced digital download of the album + additional bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).

DE LA DRIVE - POS:
You'll receive a Kickstarter-only, Plug One (Posdnuos) 1GB USB thumb drive pre-loaded with a digital copy of the album + additional bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).

DE LA DRIVE - DAVE:
You'll receive a Kickstarter-only, Plug Two (Trugoy) 1GB USB thumb drive pre-loaded with a digital copy of the album + additional bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).

DE LA DRIVE - MASE:
You'll receive a Kickstarter-only, Plug Three (Maseo) 1GB USB thumb drive pre-loaded with a digital copy of the album + additional bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).

VINYL LP IN HAND: 
We'll send you a VINYL LP of our new album + bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).
And the advanced digital download of the album + additional bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).
LISTENING PARTY + MEET AND GREET - NEW YORK
Join De La for an intimate listening party and meet and greet. We'll all chill and listen to the album together. You'll be the first ones to hear the album before it goes on sale!!
And the advanced digital download of the album + additional bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).
*Travel and accommodations not included
LISTENING PARTY + MEET AND GREET - LOS ANGELES
Join De La for an intimate listening party and meet and greet. We'll all chill and listen to the album together. You'll be the first ones to hear the album before it goes on sale!!
And the advanced digital download of the album + additional bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).

*Travel and accommodations not included
Estimated delivery: Sep 2015

T-SHIRT PACK: 
Our fans get to rep De La properly when they receive this exclusive De La Soul T-Shirt (only available via this Kickstarter).
Plus you get the CD of our new album + bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).
And the advanced digital download of the album + additional bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).

TWEET TWEET TWEET:
De La Soul will follow and shout out your twitter page? We'll not only follow you, we will periodically RT your funny, interesting, motivational, silly and informative tweets for 2015. What a way to get your own followers up!
You also get the advanced digital download of our album + additional bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).

DE LA PRINT:
You get an amazing De La Soul print, designed by artist Dan Lish (available only via this Kickstarter).
You also get the advanced digital download of the album + additional bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).

THE MAGIC NUMBER (EARLY-BIRD SPECIAL):
You'll receive all 3 (Pos, Dave, & Mase) Kickstarter-only, 1GB USB thumb drives, each pre-loaded with a digital copy of the album + additional bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter). Get all 3 now!!

T-SHIRT & VINYL PACK: 
Our fans get to rep De La properly when they receive this exclusive De La Soul T-Shirt (only available via this Kickstarter).
Plus we'll send you a VINYL LP of our new album + bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).
And the advanced digital download of the album + additional bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).

SIGN MY STUFF: 
We're sending you the CD of our new album and the exclusive De La Soul T-Shirt, both  AUTOGRAPHED (only available via this Kickstarter).
You also get the advanced digital download of the album + additional bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).

ULTIMATE FAN: 
You receive an AUTOGRAPHED Limited Edition colored vinyl LP (only 2500 made).
The exclusive De La Soul T-Shirt (only available via this Kickstarter).
The CD of our new album + bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).
And the advanced digital download of the album + additional bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).

ULTIMATE VINYL HEAD: 
Hey DJ! You get an AUTOGRAPHED Limited Edition 7" De La Soul SINGLE (only available via this Kickstarter) and an AUTOGRAPHED Limited Edition colored vinyl LP (only 2500 made).

In addition, you’ll receive:
Our exclusive De La Soul T-Shirt (only available via this Kickstarter).
The CD of our new album + bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).
The advanced digital download of the album + additional bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).
PRINT BY JOE BUCKINGHAM
"24" x "24" print of "De LA Soul is Dead" album cover by Joe Buckingham.

In addition, you’ll receive: 
The CD of our new album + bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter). 
The advanced digital download of the album + additional bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).

TALK TO ME PACK: 
You get the opportunity to Skype with Pos, Dave, & Mase... Talk about the album, chop it up about life or ask that one question you've always wanted answered.

In addition, you’ll receive:
An AUTOGRAPHED Limited Edition colored vinyl LP (only 2500 made).
Our exclusive De La Soul T-Shirt (only available via this Kickstarter).
The CD of our new album + bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).
The advanced digital download of the album + additional bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).

COMPOSITION TIME:
You receive an AUTOGRAPHED, hand-written lyric sheet of a De La song of your choice. You also get an AUTOGRAPHED black and white composition book; the same type Dave and Pos use for their rhymes.

In addition, you’ll receive:
An AUTOGRAPHED Limited Edition colored vinyl LP (only 2500 made). 
Our exclusive De La Soul T-Shirt (only available via this Kickstarter). 
The CD of our new album + bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).
The advanced digital download of the album + additional bonus track (bonus track available only via this Kickstarter).
